EmailTemplate.textOnly: Partner essentials FEATURED An in-depth look at chronic care for your clients According to the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC), 90% of the nation’s $3.5 trillion in annual healthcare expenditures are for people with chronic health conditions. Your clients are at the forefront of finding a way to tackle these rising costs. To help employers navigate the impact of the most common chronic conditions, we developed an easy-to-use guide about chronic care. RESOURCES Discover how whole-person care can control high costs. Watch webinar <[[https://view.highspot.com/viewer/60f5be04a4dfa078d41da9bc]]> Uncover insights on common chronic conditions and learn how addressing them can help clients and their employees.
